snippet: A principal and four teachers at Cayuga Elementary School in Philadelphia promoted cheating on standardized tests for five years by providing answers to students and improperly reviewing questions before administering the tests, the state’s...
abstract: Pennsylvania Atty Gen Kathleen Kane says a principal and four teachers at Cayuga Elementary School in Philadelphia promoted cheating on standardized tests for five years by providing answers to students and improperly reviewing questions before administering the tests.
lead_paragraph: A principal and four teachers at Cayuga Elementary School in Philadelphia promoted cheating on standardized tests for five years by providing answers to students and improperly reviewing questions before administering the tests, the state’s attorney general said.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Educators Charged in Cheating Scandal
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Educators Charged in Cheating Scandal
